evidence.claim: Caraway uses AWS Lambda for serverless infrastructure management.
The company ensures HIPAA compliance in its operations and data handling.
Caraway implements HL7 messaging standards for healthcare data exchange.
They utilize FHIR APIs for interoperability with EHR systems.
Their integration pattern includes RESTful API integrations for third-party services.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence found of X12-related use cases or EDI engagement on their site.
